An individual photographed in a medium shot from a slightly low angle, almost eye-level, with the camera positioned at the lower chest/waist area. A person photographed in a medium shot, taken at eye level. The subject is standing outdoors with a slight contrapposto pose, leaning gently back against a low brick wall. The body is facing the camera almost directly, with a subtle shift to the left. One leg is straight, bearing most of the weight, while the other leg is slightly bent at the knee and crossed in front, with the foot partially lifted off the ground. The subject is holding a small lit diya (oil lamp) in both hands, looking down at it with a gentle smile. Arms are bent at the elbows, bringing the diya up towards the chest. The composition is balanced, with the subject centered within the frame. There's a generous amount of headroom above the individual's head, allowing the branches of a large tree to fill the upper portion of the frame. Numerous small diyas are arranged along the brick wall and on the ground in the foreground, creating depth. The background consists of the out-of-focus tree, illuminated with strands of fairy lights.

Editorial 3x3 photo grid against a lined notebook paper backdrop, split vertically: left half realistic photo, right half detailed black-and-white manga/comic sketch. Photo of character as attached image matches 100%, wearing a light blue hoodie and holding a black pen. The real side blends smoothly into the drawn side, creating a half-human half-doodle art effect with seamless transition across the split. Lighting is soft, natural, studio-like for clean skin tones and gentle shadows. Shots to include: (1) close frontal at center, vertical split through face; left side photoreal, right side manga sketch with doodle halo of stars, hearts, smiley faces, and tiny cartoon figures (85mm, f/2.0); (2) 3/4 body with pen lifted near split edge, ink strokes crossing into the sketch side mid-air (50mm, f/2.8); (3) extreme close-up of eye at the split, iris on photo side and screentone/shaded eye on sketch side (85mm, f/1.8); (4) tight crop on hand holding black pen, pen tip drawing the boundary line between real and sketch (85mm, f/2.2); (5) full-body centered, notebook lines curving subtly toward the sketch half, hoodie texture on photo side, crosshatching on sketch side (35mm, f/5.0); (6) profile view with split through nose bridge, sketch side featuring handwritten Korean words and playful decorations floating (85mm, f/2.0); (7) medium shot with floating doodles orbiting the head on the sketch side while sticky-note style frames overlap into the real side (50mm, f/3.2); (8) tight crop of hoodie fabric transitioning from knit texture to manga screentone pattern at the seam (85mm, f/2.0); (9) medium close with hand extending from real side into sketch side, leaving a trail of drawn sparkles and mini emoticons (50mm, f/2.5). Angles: Mostly eye-level with a few slight low angles for dynamism; maintain clean geometry to emphasize the vertical split. Capture in RAW, professional color grade with soft neutrals and gentle blues; sketch side pure monochrome with crisp linework and halftone textures. Mood: creative, modern, aesthetic sketchbook portrait. Style keywords: mixed media, half drawing half real, sketchbook art, aesthetic doodle, creative portrait. Important: Character and product remain visually identical in every shot. Resolution locked to 1080×1920, vertical 9:16 ratio. Camera: RAW capture, strictly 1080×1920, vertical image (9:16) ratio.

Photorealistic full-body underwater photos of a Subject [person in the photo] in the same dark and loose clothing, hovering beneath a whitish four-panel door floating horizontally just below the rippling water surface; the door is horizontally centered in the upper third with the bottom side visible, four legible embedded rectangles, and a small dark knob near the lower middle edge, silver foam and reflections gathered just above it. The subject occupies the middle-lower third with the body completely horizontal - the spine parallel to the bottom edge of the image - head to the left of the camera and feet to the right, arms relaxed with open palms, knees loosely bent, a flow of fine bubbles rising diagonally toward the door, and the face oriented upward toward the surface/ door (chin slightly raised, gaze upward). The water forms a dark gradient from cobalt to blue - brightest near the surface and nearly black at the bottom - leaving a considerable amount of negative space around the subject. Camera at medium depth, subject level, full-frame mirrorless digital camera in an underwater housing, wide-angle 24-28 mm, f / 4, 1 / 250 s, ISO 400, daylight white balance, no filtering. Lit only by sunlight from above with soft volumetric rays and sharp highlights on the lower part of the door, minimal backscatter, crisp detail in the bubbles, clean edges, fine outlines; cinematic bluish-teal levels with neutral whites.
